Sri Lanka - Development Finance Corporation

abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Development Finance
            Corporation Project will meet a substantial portion of
            DFCC's estimated foreign exchange requirements over the
            next two years for lending to private sector industrial
            projects and tourism.
